about_the_game:
We're trying to find the items we need in a dark and scary maze and fighting against a giant creature that is chasing us! Can you stay calm and make the right moves by following the footsteps of the creature that is approaching us in a very exciting and scary environment where visibility decreases and the environment changes as we move forward, confusing us about where we should go? Experience this breathtaking adventure to find out!

>Explore the intricate labyrinth and rooms that feel different from each other and try to find the right items to move forward!
>Follow the footsteps carefully to gain an advantage against the creature chasing you and be more effective in your fight against your enemy!
>Take your game experience to the next level with the decreasing or increasing viewing angle and changing color tone as the room changes!

name: CapybaRun

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
